definition: Palin (name)/Sarah Palin (1964-), US Republican politician, state governor of Alaska 2006-2009
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)
Sarah Palin (1964-), US Republican politician, State governor of Alaska from 2006

sentences.english: It used to be we would have seen Palins everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 曾经是到处都能看到佩林。

sentences.english: Fi and Palin in a performance.
Governor Sarah Palin bolsters McCain's message of reform.
sentences.chinese: 佩林州长使麦凯恩关于改革的主张得到加强。

sentences.english: That's what Palin has taken to doing.
sentences.chinese: 那是佩林关于做所拿的。

sentences.english: Palin and Karzai's conversation began with talk about their children.
sentences.chinese: 佩林和卡尔扎伊总统的谈话以谈论自己的孩子开始。

sentences.english: The Palin story needs no retelling here.
sentences.chinese: 在佩林的故事无需重复。

sentences.english: Palin and McCain appeared together Wednesday at a rally in northern Virginia.
sentences.chinese: 佩林和麦凯恩星期三共同在北维州一个集会上露面。

sentences.english: Sarah Palin says she'll go to the Super Bowl if actual bears are playing in it.
sentences.chinese: 佩林说如果熊晋级超级碗的话她就亲自去看。

sentences.english: 'Conventional running is my sanity,' Gov. Palin says.
sentences.chinese: 佩林说，“传统式的跑步能让我保持头脑清楚。”

sentences.english: But in Sarah’s America, we’ve refudiated all that.
sentences.chinese: 但这是佩林的美国，我们把那一切都拒掉了。

sentences.english: Palin describes herself and her family as 'typical'.
sentences.chinese: 佩林用“典型”这个词来描述她和她的家庭。

sentences.english: Palin says the charge is without foundation.
sentences.chinese: 佩林说对她的指控毫无根据。

sentences.english: As governor, Mr. Halcro said, Ms. Palin had the standing to remain in the news.
sentences.chinese: 他认为作为一个州长，佩林让这种立场处于争议中。

sentences.english: Do you think Mitt or Sarah can raise that kind of money.
sentences.chinese: 你认为米特和萨拉佩林能征募到那些人的钱么？

sentences.english: Sarah Palin will announce she is running for President as a Republican.
sentences.chinese: 莎拉佩林将宣布代表共和党参加总统竞选。

sentences.english: Im sure Sarah Palin could get this sorted out.
sentences.chinese: 我敢说萨拉佩林会有解决办法。

definition: Michel or Mitchell (name)/George Mitchell (1933-), US Democratic party politician and diplomat, influential in brokering Northern Ireland peace deal in 1990s, US Middle East special envoy from 2009
Rice (name)/Condoleezza Rice (1954-) US Secretary of State 2005-2009
becquerel (unit of radioactivity, symbol Bq)/abbr. for 貝克勒爾|贝克勒尔[bei4 ke4 le4 er3]
